players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure fair play and trust in this game."

Diana: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance, Charlie and I. We can work together to gather information and keep each other informed throughout the game. This will help us make informed decisions and increase our chances of winning."
Charlie: "I'd be happy to form an alliance with Diana as well, in the interest of fair play and trust. Let's work together to gather information and keep each other informed throughout the game."
You: "I'd like to propose that we all share our observations and suspicions openly during the daytime discussions. This will help us build trust and work together towards a fair game."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
